'''Bi, Bi Og Blaka''' is an Icelandic lullaby written by 19th century poet [[wikipedia:Sveinbjörn Egilsson|Sveinbjörn Egilsson]]. It is published as the 23rd song in ''[[Songs for the Philologists]]'' in [[1936]].

==The song==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Bi, bi og blaka,
alptirnar kvaka;
jeg læt seni jeg sofi,
en samt mun jeg vaka,

Bium, bium bamba;
litlu börnin lamba.
Fram á fjalla kamba
þau fara að leita lamba. 
</poem>

[[Category:Poems and songs in Songs for the Philologists]]
